projectGridLines.title: a Software Engineer Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Role Overview

As a Software Engineer Intern at ClearFeed, you will play a crucial role in developing the backend of

our product. Your responsibilities will include:

? Development and Learning: Build efficient, clean, and reusable features, libraries, and

components.

? Design Discussions: Contribute to software design discussions and key technology

decisions.

? Collaboration: Work closely with team members on various development tasks and projects.

? Adaptability: Be ready to learn and adapt to new frameworks and languages as needed.

? Initiative: Take initiative in solving challenges and contributing to the team's problem-solving

efforts.

What We're Looking For

? Graduating in 2025 from a B.Tech or similar course with a CGPA of 7.5 and above.

? Strong Background in backend development, particularly with Node.js and TypeScript.

Experience with Sequelize and PostgreSQL is a plus.

? Passion for Development: A genuine interest in backend development and a willingness to

engage with all aspects of SaaS platform development.

? Learning Mindset: Ability to quickly learn new technologies and frameworks as required.

? Experience with Storage Backends: Familiarity with or willingness to learn about

PostgreSQL, Redis, etc.


? Proactive Attitude: A proactive approach to writing, reading, and reviewing code.

? Agile Mindset: Ability to prioritize tasks and make effective product decisions.
